DOC.brief_summary: Comparison use Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) analysis two method percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) drug elute stent : After successful drug elute stent implantation , patient randomize two group : Group A dilatation , Group B additional post-dilatation noncompliant balloon . The investigator perform IVUS analysis group A B randomization post-dilatation group B .
DOC.brief_title: Post-dilatation Optimization Drug-eluting Stents ( DES ) Deployment Assessed Intravascular Ultrasound Multicenter Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: Stent expansion DES use current stent deliver system frequently suboptimal . Further small minimal stent area ( MSA ) stent underexpansion follow deployment DES strong predictor stent thrombosis ( TVR ) target vessel revascularization . The investigator hypothesize adjunctive postdilatation noncompliant balloon improve DES deployment . After successful drug elute stent implantation , patient randomize two group : Group A dilatation , Group B additional post-dilatation noncompliant balloon . The investigator perform IVUS analysis group A B randomization post-dilatation group B . Post dilatation perform noncompliant balloon nominal diameter 0.25mm large stent balloon . The primary endpoint optimum stent deployment . For define optimal stent deployment investigator use IVUS criterion adopt MUSIC study : Complete apposition without underexpansion symmetric stent expansion . Patients eligible successful drug-eluting stent implantation native coronary artery . Patients myocardial infarction acute coronary syndrome exclude study .
DOC.criteria: Successful drug elute stent implantation native coronary artery Percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Left main coronary artery ; Myocardial infarction ; Acute coronary syndrome ; Emergency PCI ; PCI instent restenosis ;
DOC.keyword: Optimal stent deployment define intravascular ultrasound analysis
